content:
You're going to bring a variety of cookies, including the vegan chocolate chip cookies we discussed earlier. That's great! Offering a selection of treats can cater to different tastes and dietary needs.

And wow, you've had a great experience with vegan mac and cheese, too! Cashew-based cheese sauces are incredibly versatile and can be used in many dishes. The creamy texture and flavor they provide are often a game-changer for vegan recipes.

If you don't mind me asking, what inspired you to try veganism, and how has your experience been so far? Have you noticed any differences in how you feel or any challenges you've faced in transitioning to a vegan lifestyle?

Also, are you planning to bring any other vegan dishes to the potluck, or will you be focusing on the cookies?
